quotes.text: # import common libraries\nimport pandas as pd
# import data.csv as a dataframe\ndf = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
# review the first five rows of df\ndf.head()
# review the last five rows of df\ndf.tail()
# review the non-null count and data types\ndf.info()
# get the descriptive stats for df\ndf.describe()

# set the decimal format to 2 decimal places
pd.set_option('display.float_format', '{:,.2f}'.format)

# Count how many null values in each column
df.isna().sum()

# Drop rows that have null values
df.dropna(inplace = True)
